items.sentence: No matter what they tell me, I still plan to go to Boston on Monday.
Tom and Mary didn\'t seem to understand what John wanted them to do.
Tom began to wonder how Mary always seemed to know where he\'d been.
Tom didn\'t expect that Mary would be able to play the harp so well.
Tom\'s father was the one who built the house that Tom\'s living in.
I thought you might like to know that Tom isn\'t planning on coming.
I wanted to borrow your camera to take pictures of Tom\'s new house.
One thing you definitely don\'t want to do is borrow money from Tom.
Three months ago, I didn\'t even know how to say one word of French.
I don\'t know why I even thought that you might consider doing that.
